author: Justine Calma
title: America set up black communities to be harder hit by COVID-19
description: Data from states, including New York, Michigan, and Illinois, is beginning to show that more African Americans are contracting the novel coronavirus and dying from COVID-19. The pandemic is adding to a history of health disparities and discrimination.
content: The COVID-19 pandemic is piling on top of a litany of health inequalities in America to kill a disproportionate number of African Americans. In Chicago alone, black residents make up more than half of all cases and about 70 percent of those whove died of the … [+7655 chars]
